Articles.Content:
Ok I have KSP on steam and love it .. so much so that I have been wanting to get it also on my xbox. Now I know there are issues with it ... willing to put up with them but would like to know is it at least playable ?

I have been trying to keep an eye out for another sale deal as I missed out when it was reduced before christmas and was hoping it might show up during the xbox spring sale but sadly it hasnt. 

So ...

Is it playable to justify the full price on the xbox store , if not are there any discount codes flying around for it or will it ever be on sale at a reduced price again ? 

 

As I said I do have it on steam but really worried that at its current cost on xbox that its console bugs are not worth putting up with.

 

Thanks for any help or info that comes my way

 

Richard
